mapper.delete: update data_collection set delete_flag=1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id,case_id as caseId,seqno,color,bail_date as bailDate,expect_time as expectTime,area, dept,odv,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_type as telType, mobile,result,collect_time as collectTime,method,repay_time as repayTime, repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,collect_status collectStatus,reduce_status as reduceStatus from data_collection
delete_flag = 0
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
AND measure like CONCAT('%',#{measure},'%')
AND client like CONCAT('%',#{client},'%')
AND case_status like CONCAT('%',#{caseStatus},'%')
AND result like CONCAT('%',#{result},'%')
AND batch_no like CONCAT('%',#{batchNo},'%')
AND ident_no like CONCAT('%',#{identNo},'%')
AND card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
AND collect_info like CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo},'%')
AND color like CONCAT('%',#{color},'%')
AND seqno like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
